improvements: There's been a tweak to the UI. Hopefully it's not too noticeable. The country map/data filter has been watered down, so let me know if you miss the old view
Lots of optimizations, so pdx.tools should now be faster, scale a bit better, and be cheaper to run.

headline: Been awhile, but I've been working behind the scenes on an update that should...
summary: Been awhile, but I've been working behind the scenes on an update that should set a better foundation for the future. It's live today
